explains: n. 晶体管；晶体管收音机（transistor radio）
wordGroup: field effect transistor [计]场效应晶体管
bipolar transistor 双极型晶体管
thin film transistor 薄膜晶体管
transistor amplifier 晶体管放大器
insulated gate bipolar transistor 绝缘栅双极型晶体管
transistor radio n. 晶体管收音机
junction transistor 面结型晶体管；结式晶体管

sentences.en: This transistor radio has four small cells.
sentences.cn: 这台半导体收音机用4节小电池。

sentences.en: Every transistor has at least three electrodes.
sentences.cn: 每个晶体管至少有三个电极。
